ValidationRule.description: Siebel Activities only allow 150 characters. When a rep manually creates a Task with "App Forwarded to Credit", "FYI" or "Info Returned" Type, this rule need to limit them to type more than 150 char
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND((LEN( Description )>=150 || ISBLANK(Description)), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'App Forwarded to Credit')|| ISPICKVAL(Type, 'FYI')|| ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Info Returned'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Comments must be between 1 and 149 characters
